nodes.name: Inspiration
nodes.desc: Applies Inspiration to yourself and allies within 30 meters.

nodes.name: Intellect Conversion
nodes.desc: Every 10 points of Intellect provides 1 point of MATK.

nodes.name: Regen Bud
nodes.desc:
Casting a Special Attack grants 1 Regen Bud.

Initial cap of Regen Buds: 4.
When an Expertise Skill or Ultimate generates healing, 2 Regen Buds are consumed to throw a Nourishing Seed, triggering up to once per second.
When an Expertise Skill or Ultimate deals DMG, 2 Regen Buds are consumed to shoot a Wild Seed once per second.

nodes.name: Defensive Blessing
nodes.desc: Inspiration additionally grants the target 200 Armor.

nodes.name: Energy Surge
nodes.desc: Every 2% haste provides 1% energy natural recovery efficiency.

nodes.name: Regeneration Bud
nodes.desc: When dealing damage with normal attacks, 10% chance to gain 1 Regen Bud.

nodes.name: Healing Breath
nodes.desc: When a Special Attack, Expertise Skill, or Ultimate generates Healing, there is a 20% chance to trigger Healing Chain. For every 2% Luck, the chance +1%.

nodes.name: Divine Ascension of the Flower Realm
nodes.desc: When Wild Seed deals DMG or Nourishing Seed generates healing, you gain a 10% Forest DMG bonus for the next 8s.

nodes.name: Dancing Seed
nodes.desc:
When a DMG-type Expertise Skill triggers Lucky Hit, next Wild Seed launches 1 more projectile.
For every 5 Nourishing Seeds thrown, next Nourishing Seed throws 1 more projectile.

nodes.name: Smite Spec
nodes.desc:
Further enhances the ability to use Wild Bloom.
Wild Bloom, Regen Pulse, and Nature Ward applies Symbiotic Mark to allies.
Symbiotic Mark: Lasts for 10s, all DMG dealt heals the Symbiotic Mark target for 45% of the DMG.

Healing of Stillness: If you don't deal DMG to enemies for 5s, each hit of your Basic Attack restores HP to up to 10 allies, prioritizing Allies. All four hits restore a total of 12.6% of your Max HP.

nodes.name: Nature Shield
nodes.desc:
When Wild Bloom heals a target, it also applies Nature Shield to them.
Targets with Nature Shield restore HP when hit, with the amount equal to 10% of your ATK. This effect can occur up to once per second.

nodes.name: Pulse Duality
nodes.desc: When Regen Pulse is actively used, it spreads twice.

nodes.name: Thorns
nodes.desc:
When Wild Seed hits a target, it inflicts Thorn on them.
Verdant DMG dealt by players to targets with Thorn +5%.

nodes.name: Shelter
nodes.desc: Within 5s after Casting Infusion, the damage absorption of the Nature Shield added by Wild Bloom or Nature Ward is doubled.

nodes.name: Luck Damage
nodes.desc:
Lucky Hit DMG Multiplier +5%.
Every 1% Luck grants 1% Lucky Hit DMG Multiplier.

nodes.name: Wild Blessing
nodes.desc:
Wild Bloom now stores up to 2 overdrives.
Wild Bloom's Energy cost -15%.

nodes.name: Final Bloomwheel
nodes.desc: When Wild bloom triggers a Lucky Hit, it reduces the CD of Infusion by 3s.

nodes.name: Bloomheal
nodes.desc: Replace Ultimate, Divine Circle Bloom with Bloomheal.

nodes.name: Wide-area Thorns
nodes.desc: Successful hit of Feral Seed on the targets with Thorn spreads Thorn to other units within 10 meters.

nodes.name: Pulse Retrospect
nodes.desc:
Regen Pulse returns to your position after it reaches the max distance.
Regen Pulse now deals DMG to enemies.

nodes.name: Bud Acquisition
nodes.desc: When an enemy within 10 meters that you are engaged with (effective within a team) is defeated, generates an Engram Orb, which grants 1 Regen Bud upon pickup.

nodes.name: Feral Seed Symbiosis
nodes.desc: When the number of active Symbiotic Marks is greater than or equal to 5, the damage of Feral Seeds +100%.

nodes.name: Pulse Echo
nodes.desc:
When dealing DMG, Infusion grants 1 stack of Pulse Echo.
Pulse Echo: Increases DMG dealt of Regen Pulse by 20%, which lasts 12s and stacks up to 5 times.

nodes.name: Breath of Symbiosis
nodes.desc: Symbiotic Mark enhances Healingiveness by 2%. Each 5% Mastery enhances Healingiveness by 1%.

nodes.name: Laceration
nodes.desc:
When dealing DMG, Infusion inflicts Laceration on the target.
Laceration: Takes 100% more DMG from Thorn in 2s.

nodes.name: Stag Charge
nodes.desc:
After triggering a total of 10 Nourishing Seeds or Wild Seeds, Wild Bloom evolves into Stag Charge.
Casting Stag Charge instants grants 3 Regen Buds.

nodes.name: Wings of Revival
nodes.desc:
When an ally within 20 meters takes DMG exceeding 30% of their HP, Revival triggers, which can affect the same target up to once every 45s.
Revival: Restores HP equal to 50% of the DMG taken over 5s.

nodes.name: Arcane of Green
nodes.desc: When Feral Seed deals DMG, it increases the DMG dealt by Infusion, Wild Bloom, Stag Charge in the next 10s by 20%.

nodes.name: Verdant Blessing
nodes.desc:
When HP of an ally with Inspiration drops below 20%, Blessing triggers.
Blessing: Grants a Nature Shield and reduces the DMG taken by 35% for 8s, once every 60s.

nodes.name: Flourish
nodes.desc: When Infusion, Feral Seed, or Wild Bloom deals DMG, 30% chance to reduce the CD of the Ultimate by 1s, once per second.

nodes.name: Double Infusion
nodes.desc: After casting Stag Charge, the number of channels for the next Infusion +100%.

nodes.name: Symbiosis Extension
nodes.desc: Each Wild Seed fired extends the duration of activated Symbiotic Mark by 1 second.

nodes.name: Swift Bud
nodes.desc: Each Regen Bud gained, reduces the CD of Feral Seed by 1 second.

nodes.name: Healing Pulse
nodes.desc: When an enemy within 10 meters that you are engaged with (effective within a team) is defeated, generates a Healing Pulse. This can only occur once every 10s.

nodes.name: Swift Shelter
nodes.desc: Each use or trigger of Regen Pulse, reduces the CD of Nature Ward by 2s.

nodes.name: Wild Luck
nodes.desc: When Wild Bloom or Regen Pulse deal DMG, grants a chance (equal to the half percentage of Luck) to gain 1 Regen Bud. If the target is affected by Thorn, doubles the chance.

nodes.name: Pulse Breath
nodes.desc: If equipped with Regen Pulse skill, Nature Ward and Ultimates will trigger Regen Pulse when their CDs are completed.

nodes.name: Verdant Impact
nodes.desc: For every 20 stacks of Pulse Echo gained, the next actively cast Regen Pulse triggers a Blossom Charge at both the nearest enemy and the Ally with lowest HP.

nodes.name: Wild Protection
nodes.desc:
The charge count of Nature Ward +1.
The charge time of Nature Ward decreases by 5s.

nodes.name: Lifebind Spec
nodes.desc:
Replace Special Attack with Life Bloom and enhances the skill.
Life Bloom generates 20% more healing.
Casting Life Bloom grants 1 additional Regen Bud.

nodes.name: Healing Infusion
nodes.desc: Every 5 uses of Life Bloom enhances the next direct healing Expertise Skill by 100%

nodes.name: Lifeforce Extension
nodes.desc: Increases the Healing of Healing Chain by 10%. For every 7% Mastery, Healing Chain jumps 1 additional time.

nodes.name: Energy Arcane
nodes.desc:
During Growth Arcane, increases ERG REG SPD by 50%.
Increases Grove Wish's Crit by 10%.

nodes.name: Transcendence
nodes.desc: Every 60 self-heals from Nourish grants Transcendence.

nodes.name: Verdant Nourishment
nodes.desc: If you're affected with Nourish, reduces all DMG taken by 10%. If the targets are affected by Nourish, enhances their Healing Received from yourself by 5%. If the stack of Nourish is above or equal to 3, additionally enhances Healing Received by 3%.

nodes.name: Life Bloom
nodes.desc: Using Blossom Charge enhances the next Life Bloom, skipping the cast and increasing the Healing by 50%.

nodes.name: Full Bloom
nodes.desc: Casting Life Bloom grants a fixed 50% chance to reduce the CD of Blossom Charge and Regen by 2s.

nodes.name: Vital Surge
nodes.desc: Replace Ultimate, Divine Circle Bloom with Vital Surge.

nodes.name: Blooming Reincarnation
nodes.desc: Casting Life Bloom increases Life Bloom's healing by 20% and its ENG consumed by 10% for 4s. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

nodes.name: Vitality
nodes.desc: Nourish can stack up to 5 times. Each use of Life Bloom grants the targets with Nourish 1 stack of Nourish.

nodes.name: Gift of Life
nodes.desc: When an enemy within 10 meters that you are engaged with (effective within a team) is defeated, generates a Healing Orb. This can only occur once ever 2s.

nodes.name: Flower Time Dance
nodes.desc:
Every 45s, generates 1 Flower Stalk in the following order:
Crimson Insight, Golden Devotion, and Moonlight Solace.

nodes.name: Nourish Essence
nodes.desc: When Life Bloom generates healing, 50% chance to apply Nourish.

nodes.name: Endless Blossom
nodes.desc: When casting Blossom charge, Grove Wish, or Regen Pulse, 20% chance that the next cast of Life Bloom within 5s consumes no Energy.

nodes.name: Flourishing Progress
nodes.desc: When holding 2 or more Regen Buds, casting Blossom Charge for damage or healing always triggers a corresponding seed (without costing Regen Buds) and grants 1 Regen Bud.

nodes.name: Verdant Root
nodes.desc:
While in battle state, standing still for 2s creates a Grass Domain.
Grass Domain: While inside the Grass Domain, your Haste +10%. Upon exiting the Grass Domain, 0. Your Movement SPD +50% for 5s, and Grass Domain disappears.

nodes.name: Natural Bloom
nodes.desc: When healing an ally with lower than 30% HP, Natural Bloom triggers, instantly restoring HP equal to 200% ATK to them. This effect can occur up to once every 30s.

nodes.name: Energy Expansion
nodes.desc:
Increases Max Energy by 20.
Using Blossom Charge restores 30% lost Energy.

nodes.name: Verdant Duet
nodes.desc: Life bloom has a fixed 20% chance to heal 1 additional time.

nodes.name: Wings of Revival
nodes.desc:
When an ally within 20 meters takes DMG exceeding 30% of their HP, Revival triggers, which can affect the same target up to once every 45s.
Revival: Restores HP equal to 50% of the DMG taken over 5s.

nodes.name: Bud to Blossom
nodes.desc: When a Flower Stalk appears, grants 1 Regen Bud every 2s for 10s.

nodes.name: Inspire and Strengthen
nodes.desc: Inspiration additionally grants 50 bonus Intellect, Strength, Agility, and Stamina.

nodes.name: Floral Whisper
nodes.desc: Healing Expertise generate 20% more healing, but healing from Life Bloom -50%.

nodes.name: Healing Pulse
nodes.desc: When an enemy within 10 meters that you are engaged with (effective within a team) is defeated, generates a Healing Pulse. This can only occur once ever 10s.

nodes.name: Instant Bloom
nodes.desc: Every 5 uses of Life Bloom accelerates the using of Grove Wish or Regen Pulse by 100% and increases their Healing by 50% in 15s.

nodes.name: Rescue
nodes.desc: Healing Expertise restore 25% more HP to the targets with HP below 50%.

nodes.name: Flourishing Flower
nodes.desc: Within Grass Domain, Flower Stalk appeared 50% earlier.

nodes.name: Tricolor Revelation
nodes.desc:
Consumes Moonlight Solace to launch Flower Dance - Tricolor Revelation.
Flower Dance - Tricolor Revelation: Grants all effects of Flower Stalks, once every 60s.
